{QuestionText}: Does your agency have a centralized[1] patch management process? (yes/no)
If no, does your agency set centralized policies and standards for a patch management process? (yes/no)
If yes, does the agency’s centralized patch management process utilize the severity of a vulnerability (e.g., KEV, CVSS, SSVC) to prioritize patches? (yes/no)
Does your patching prioritization process leverage significant automation?[2] (yes/no)
If yes, what percentage of software assets are covered by this automation?
Has the agency achieved the capabilities to, and consistently met, the actions required as of April 3, 2023, under Binding Operational Directive 23-01? **
Mean time to remediation of Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEVs) in days[3]
